article_title: Ramesh Ponnuru and Yuval Levin: A Conservative Alternative to ObamaCare
article_text:
As ObamaCare's failures and victims mount by the day, Republicans have so far mostly been watching in amazement. They expected the law to fail, but even among its most ardent opponents few imagined the scale and speed of the fiasco.

Seeing the pileup, Republicans might be tempted to step aside and let ObamaCare continue to disappoint and infuriate Americans. After all, the GOP doesn't have the power to repeal the law, or even to make...

twitter.description: In The Wall Street Journal, Ramesh Ponnuru and Yuval Levin write that to avoid a lurch to the left if the current law fails, the time is right for Republicans to present sensible, market-oriented reforms.
twitter.title: Ponnuru and Levin: A Conservative Alternative to ObamaCare

image.alt: Ramesh Ponnuru and Yuval Levin: A Conservative Alternative to ObamaCare
